name: Cloud Templates & Patterns collection
author: ThemeIsle

sections.description:
A cloud based templates library which enables you to create or use existing ready-made website with 1-click.

More than 100 Starter Sites and Templates available for the most popular page builders

Browse a wide selection of templates and starter sites that are designed to help you build beautiful websites with Elementor and Gutenberg. All templates can be previewed on demosites.io and you can seamlessly import them to any of your sites. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned pro, our templates can help you save time and create stunning websites without any coding knowledge.
In addition to our Elementor and Gutenberg templates, we also offer a handful of page templates for Beaver Builder. These templates are perfect for creating basic pages such as contact pages, about pages, and blog pages. If you’re a Beaver Builder user, be sure to check out our selection of page templates.

Your own private Templates Cloud [PRO]

Boost productivity and speed up your workflow by saving all your designs and share them automatically to all your sites in 1-click.
Check more details about this in our documentation guide.

The plugin is relying on the service behind api.themeisle.com for accessing the template collection list and their individual structure on import.

No account is required to access the service template collection and the privacy policy can be found here.
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Right now we are supporting only Neve theme

Which starter sites and templates are free and which are not?

You can check the full collection on demosites.io

Can I import just one page from one starter site?

Yes, you can. You can either chose to import one template or the entire starter site.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.2.10 (2024-07-18)

  • Fixed Navigation block error
  • Fixed Starter Sites loading and the problem with saving in the template cloud

Version 1.2.9 (2024-04-17)

Improvements

  • Updated internal dependencies: Enhanced performance and security.

Version 1.2.8 (2024-04-03)

Improvements

  • Added compatibility for importing templates of Full Site Editing (FSE) themes.
  • Updated internal dependencies for better performance and stability.

Version 1.2.7 (2024-02-23)

Fixes

  • Text improvements
  • Updated dependencies

Version 1.2.6 (2024-01-11)

New Features

  • New button to import a TPC template directly into a post, page, or custom layout

Improvements

  • Updated dependencies

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed Elementor content on template import.
  • Fixed typo in onboarding text.

Version 1.2.5 (2023-10-26)

Improvements

  • Enhance code quality: Elevated the code quality for the recently introduced onboarding feature
  • Fine-tune development processes and rectify minor issues: Integrated the PHPStan tool to fine-tune the development workflow, proactively preventing potential code errors

Version 1.2.4 (2023-10-17)

Bug Fixes

  • Dashboard notification: Ensure proper syntax is utilized to access the static variable in the logger.

Version 1.2.3 (2023-10-09)

Bug Fixes

  • Security Patch: Addressed an issue where log files had a predictable name, enhancing the privacy of WordPress details.

Version 1.2.2 (2023-10-05)

Improvements

  • Onboarding UX: Enhanced the onboarding process for a smoother user experience.

Bug Fixes

  • Onboarding redirection: Fixed the issue where users got redirected to the old onboarding if they were installing the Cloud Templates & Patterns collection plugin from the dashboard

short_description: A cloud based service with 100+ templates and starter sites for Neve theme.
